phrases: Looks like it is working well.
It absorbs your excess magic and makes crystal flowers by the morning.
Although it looks a bit crazy.
They look tasty to the likes of us.
And the fish is from Selkie?
Ah, she does quick work, as always.
Chise, can you show me the bracelet you got in Ant Hill?
With this, you will be practically unable to absorb or create magic.
It will be perfect for your body.
Listen, do not do any experiments or magic without my permission, all right?
I can do hardly anything right now.
Everyone is given me so much,
and I cannot give anything back.
I will do whatever I can while my body still moves.
Elias, I am going to thank Simon-san.
I cannot have you sneaking off to London again.
I-I will not go without telling you anymore.
Um, have you seen a boy around?
She darted off, saying her brother's gone missing.
She is our only child, though.
Please help me find my brother, Ethan!
I came to my grandma's place for Christmas break.
I took Ethan to the yard, but...
He is frail, but he refused to go back inside.
Then we got in a fight.
You are such a selfish little brother!
I told them that Ethan had vanished.
I am the only one who remembers my brother.
They suddenly forgot about their own child?
When we help people, we receive an appropriate payment.
What will you do for us?
I-I am here at least once a month.
I will make lots and lots of sweets!
If it is money you want, I will work.
For my whole life, if I have to!
You must be scared, with all these weird things happening.
But it is not any scarier than not having my brother back.
It is dangerous to split up.
Do not stray away from any of us.
We can find you if you get lost, as long as you hold onto that.
Let us ask the neighbors here.
I do not know if they will give us a straight answer, though.
A Sleigh Beggy is a queen bee.
A queen bee gives birth to the children, so the hive takes care of her.
It is not magic, so it is okay, right?
It is not a bad negotiation tactic, I suppose.
Tell me where her brother is.
What are you talking to, Chise?
Do not worry about it, Stella.
Shoot... I am out of flowers...
It is okay, do not wo
You are mages, are not you?
Cannot you do it without hurting yourselves?
I had a brother, too, but I cannot see him anymore.
So I want you to be able to see yours.
This is the only way we can find him for now.
I am sorry I scared you.
I am looking forward to your sweets.
I am going to treat that when we get home.
I did not want to make you do it.
I was the one who suggested it.
I should thank you for coming out this far.
I found a young child abandoned in the snow.
What an odd thing to say.
You are the one who abandoned him, are you not?
Words and text are sounds and shapes that bear souls.
Should they reach another, they cannot be undone.
You are such a selfish little brother!
There is no telling what kind of creature will appreciate the words you spew forth.
It is a good thing you did not tell him to die.
You and your brother's bond has been broken,
Can you remember your dear brother's name?
That is what it means for a bond to be broken.
To forget his name, his age, where he is from, his face, his voice,
and whether he even existed at all.
Can you pay the appropriate compensation, have-not?
Then let us play a game, have-not.
Join us, child of the shadows.
Let us give you until sundown.
If you can find them before that, you win.
If you cannot, they are mine.
Search frantically for them, with that beastly nose of yours.
The days are short in the winter.
Am I going to forget him?
We just have to find them.
You are from the far east.
He is from the far west.
And yet, you managed to find each other.
You are not going to miss him on this tiny hill.
You are his older sister, are not you?
You should believe in yourself and your brother.
If you care about him enough that it makes you cry, you will not lose your bond so easily.
Whether it is family or anything else, it is...
Let us look for them together.
Ruth, can you track their scent?
With that beastly nose of yours...
Ruth, take care of Stella for me.
Is it really safe to use that?
My place has already been decided.
And Chise cannot use her magic right now.
You are just like your sister.
Or is it your actual skull?
I do not know how to react.
Do you remember your sister's name?
You said you do not need your nagging sister, did not you?
Do you really not need her?
I do not really understand families or marriage.
Would I understand those emotions if I had blood relatives?
I have never thought about whether we are related by blood or not.
So it is a unit, a group of people who cohabitate and help each other out for a long time.
You make it sound like it could be anyone.
I think I really want to tell my sister I am sorry.
I want to party with her again.
I do not want it to be anyone else.
I think that is what family is.
People that make you feel that way.
Why do you look like me?
A child's curiosity is terrifyingly powerful.
I said, we are going home!
You do not want a brother like me, do you?
Does it suck having me as your big sister?
I do not mind having a kid brother, as long as it is you.
It is not like I know of any other brothers, anyway.
I am okay with you being my older sister.
You mean you want me being your older sister, dummy.
Do you remember his name now?
Holy crap, my clothes are not wet.
It is a pain not to be able to say his name.
I cannot keep up with you.
It is fun to watch people when they are serious.
That is why we stay nearby to listen.
I will have what bond you have lost.
She is my new friend I met today.
I am going to keep my promise.
The girl's first friend makes her heart dance.
But the existence of her friend slightly warps her relationship with the mage.
